item.title: I-5 South - Exits 678B and 678A
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 678B - CA-44 West. Approaching Exit 678A - CA-44 East/Lassen National Park. I-5 continues south towards Red Bluff and Sacramento.

item.title: I-5 South - Exits 680 and 678B-A
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 680 - CA-299/Lake Blvd. Approaching Exit 678B-A - CA-44 Jct. CA-299 is the northern most east-west highway that connects the coast with Nevada in California.

item.title: CA-36 East Approaching CA-44
item.description: Approaching CA-44 to Redding and Mt. Shasta on CA-36 east, in Lassen County.

item.title: CA-36 East at CA-44
item.description: CA-36 at eastern end of CA-44 to Redding and Mt. Shasta.

item.title: CA-36 East at CA-44
item.description: CA-36 east at CA-44 to Redding and Mt. Shasta, in Lassen County.

item.title: CA-36 East at CR-A21 to CA-44
item.description: Use CR-A21 north for CA-44 in Westwood.

item.title: End CA-44 at CA-36
item.description: End CA-44 at CA-36 junction in Lassen County.

item.title: Jct. CA-44 on CA-36 East
item.description: Approaching CA-44 to Redding and Mt. Shasta on CA-36 east, in Lassen County.
